text: pas shayad ke aap is wahi ke kisi hisse ko chohd dene wale hai jo aap ki taraf nazil ki jati hai aur is se aap ka dil tang hai sirf un ki is baat par ke is par koi khazana kyo nahi utra? ya is ke saath koi farishta hee ata,sun lijiye! ke aap to sirf darane wale hee hai aur har cheez ka zimmedar Allah tala hai
